info.title: In Russia, a biographical film about the Zirinsky is planned
info.short_text: The film on Vladimir Girovsky's life will be filmed in Russia.

info.title: Spread the dog's nose. The metrosers left behind a lot of artifacts.
info.short_text: Every day, people travel on the subway and don't think about each station having a unique story. Aif.ru found out what artifacts of the Soviet era had left construction in the Moscow subway.

info.title: Adam Kadirov gave certificates to Baisangur Benoivski battalion fighters
info.short_text: Police certifiers were handed over to the Chief of Security of Chechnya Adam Kadirov.

info.title: Deputa Dmitri Kuznetsov proposed the establishment of the Ahmat Friendship Academy
info.short_text: According to parliamentarians, it will be an example of healthy and inspiring inter-ethnic relations.

info.title: A gift to students. Putin started building campuses in Russia
info.short_text: A total of 25 inter-agency spaces will be opened

info.title: Putin evaluated the robot handle on the Rosia exhibition, drawing his portrait.
info.short_text: Robot painted a picture of the Russian leader in the picture.

info.title: In Russia, the first case against the colloctors was filed under a new article of the Criminal Code.
info.short_text: The Director of the FSSP has established the practice of criminalizing debt-recovery violations.

info.title: The head of the Israeli Ministry of Foreign Affairs, Katz, met with the B-2 musicians
info.short_text: Israel Katz believes that members of the rock group were allegedly able to extradite to the Russian Federation, where they were expected to be imprisoned for a long time.

info.title: The Supreme Court stepped on the side of a man who bought the equipment cheaply because of a malfunction.
info.short_text: Kurgan's resident bought tech for 26,000 roubles instead of 90,000 because of a malfunction.

info.title: Rudal's critic made a joke about giving a literary award to Von and Lesus.
info.short_text: The publicist believes that prankers should be rewarded with " purifying domestic verbalism " .

info.title: Ghosduudoua Gorelkin reported that ChatGPT would not appear on the Gosules
info.short_text: Head of the Ministry of the Interior, Maxut Shadayev, stated that the agency was planning to start using GPT technology in the Public Service in 2024.

info.title: Putinu was invited to visit the High Oil School in Tatarstan
info.short_text: The invitation was made by the President of the Almiteev State Oil Institute, Alexander Diaconov.

info.title: Voronezh ' s court detained the Amphetaminian drug locker.
info.short_text: The perpetrator was part of a criminal group that distributed drugs in the city.

info.title: Expert Bondarenko: no combatant army in Germany and will not
info.short_text: According to the expert, the Germans, while living in security for decades, " they were born as warriors " .

info.title: Putin proposed to extend the campus development programme to the Russian Federation
info.short_text: The President considers the opening of campuses to be a good example of the cooperation of the Government and the business to develop the human capital of the RF.

info.title: Bondarenko: The German War Charter has been recruited by American intelligence
info.short_text: The expert stated that the ruling elites in Germany, calling for military conflict with the Russian Federation, were bought and recruited by American intelligence.

info.short_text: The victims are hospitalized in serious condition

info.title: The confiscator decided to put the tarantula in the driveway to scare neighbors.

info.short_text: The President of Russia emphasized that he would be in the region shortly.
